channel.title: A gameframe expert
channel.description:
[center]I need help, how do I add the text and make it smaller?
[code]All Game Public On Private On Clan On Trade On Assist On Report Abuse[/code]
[b]Pleaaaase.[/b][/center]

item.title: A gameframe expert
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

With the client you’re probably using. There is a way but we haven’t found out how yet as we don’t have the methods. Unless of course you are using HCOJustin’s Client or Webber’s Client. Anything other than that. Good Luck.

Read full topic
